channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16969] RegionCoprocessorServiceExec should override the toString() for debugging
item.description:
The toString() method is used to log in BatchErrors#makeException.

BatchErrors.java

synchronized RetriesExhaustedWithDetailsException makeException(boolean logDetails) {

  if (logDetails) {LOG.error("Exception occurred! Exception details: " + throwables + ";\nActions: " + actions);

 }

If RegionCoprocessorServiceExec doesn’t override the toString(), we will see the hash code in the log message. That message is useless for debugging.
item.summary: RegionCoprocessorServiceExec should override the toString() for debugging

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
